info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.adaptiveparser.clf
info:identity.info:description:
Support for [https://httpd.apache.org/docs/1.3/logs.html#common|Common Log Format (CLF)] library.
The Common Log Format is a standard format that can be produced by many different web servers and read by many log analysis programs.
This toolkit provides CLFParser composite with a ready to use pre-configured AdaptiveParser operator, parameterized for CLF format parsing.
